text: Bad Lieutenant is a 1992 American crime drama movie starring Harvey Keitel in the title role as a New York City police detective. The movie is rated NC-17, though an R-rated version of the movie exists. It was directed by Abel Ferrara. Also appearing in the movie are Zoe Lund and Victor Argo. == Other websites == * Category:1992 crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Film noir Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Murder in movies Category:NC-17 rated movies Category:Rape in movies Category:Movies directed by Abel Ferrara Category:Obscenity controversies Category:American independent movies Category:1992 independent movies
title: Bad Lieutenant
